<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10212017/" title="Permalink to Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/21/2017" rel="bookmark">Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/21/2017</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10212017/" title="11:59 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T23:59:30+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10212017/#comments">5</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/newsfeed.gif" width=92 height=141 border=0 hspace=8 vspace=5 align=right title="Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/21/2017" />The Spanish government has used a clause in the national constitution to revoke Catalonia’s regional autonomy in the wake of the latter’s independence referendum, which Spain says is illegal. As part of the process, Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy may remove the Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont from office.</p>
<p>In other news, President Donald Trump has ordered that all remaining classified government files on the assassination of President Kennedy be made available to the public.</p>
<p>To see the headlines and the articles, click “Continue reading” below.</p>
<p>Thanks to Charles Low, Dean, JD, LP, Reader from Chicago, and all the other tipsters who sent these in.</p>
<p><strong>Notice to tipsters:</strong> Please don’t submit extensive excerpts from articles that have been posted behind a subscription firewall, or are otherwise under copyright protection.</p>
<p><strong>Caveat:</strong> Articles in the news feed are posted “as is”. Gates of Vienna cannot vouch for the authenticity or accuracy of the contents of any individual item posted here. We check each entry to make sure it is relatively interesting, not patently offensive, and at least superficially plausible. The link to the original is included with each item’s title. Further research and verification are left to the reader.</p>

<article id="post-44249" class="post-44249 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-american-election-2016 category-culture-wars category-europe category-media category-pcmc category-politics category-usa">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-core-problem-again/" title="Permalink to The Core Problem, Again" rel="bookmark">The Core Problem, Again</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-core-problem-again/" title="11:33 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T23:33:41+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-core-problem-again/#comments">42</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/masshysteria.jpg"></p>
<div align=center><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/masshysteria.jpg" border=0 vspace=5 width=540 height=284 title="Mass hysteria" /></div>
<p></a></p>
<p>The other day Dymphna <a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/california-set-itself-on-fire/">posted about</a> the intersection of California’s new law declaring itself a “sanctuary state” and the recent catastrophic wildfires that have devastated areas in the northern part of the state. Earlier today a commenter named NMObserver left the following remarks on that post: </p>
<blockquote>
<p>A question that I don’t see being asked is how much money Gov. Brown has accepted from Mexican drug cartels. What other reason could there be for this man to sell out his own country and his fellow citizens? His actions simply further the Mexican colonization of California. The same question needs to be asked about other California officials like Xavier Becerra and Fabian Nunez and Eric Garcetti. And then there are all the California assemblymen that have no trouble voting to turn CA into a sanctuary state. Probably many of them have also been bought with drug money.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>The commenter had touched upon one of my <a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/07/the-core-problem/">pet topics</a>. This was my response:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Yet somehow Governor Moonbeam actually obtained the votes necessary to get elected. The Aztecs and MS-13 members aren’t enough to account for that. Millions upon millions of white, native English speakers voted to have this man as their governor.</p>
<p>Scale it up, and a similar process elected Hussein as president. Twice.</p>
<p>The core problem is not the invaders and the violent Third World masses. The core problem is not even the white traitors who deliberately, proactively import them.</p>
<p>The core problem is the fact that a large proportion of the productive white native English-speaking population assents via the ballot box to what is happening, over and over again. Willingly, even eagerly. With pride in their own virtue for putting these corrupt criminal traitors in charge.</p>
<p>THAT is the core problem. Until it is addressed and dealt with, nothing will change significantly. The bus will continue its trajectory over the cliff.</p>
<p>The same may be said of Western Europe. A different cast of characters — Africans and Muslims instead of Aztecs, and far more socialism than even California has — but the same process is underway.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>As satisfying as it is to blame political leaders for our current dire situation, even in the most thoroughly propagandized and socially controlled Western countries (think: Sweden) it is possible to unseat elected leaders via the ballot box. When enough rascals are thrown out, major policy changes will be implemented, and a different political game will begin.</p>
<p>Yes, election fraud can give a particular candidate victory over an opponent, but only at the margin. When dissatisfaction is widespread enough, fraud is not enough. The election of Donald Trump is proof, because his opponent tried every dirty trick in the book (and made up some new ones) in an effort to keep him out of power.</p>
<p>But Trump’s victory is a rarity. It does not change the fact that the electorate is deeply polarized, and came within a hair’s breadth of electing a third term of Obama by putting a pants-suited white termagant in the White House.</p>
<p>How is it that voters throughout the West keep voting for the destruction of their own nations and cultures?</p>
<p>How is it that people keep re-electing the same politicians who ignore their wishes, over and over again?</p>
<p> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-core-problem-again/#more-44249" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="meta-nav">&rarr;</span></a></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->
<footer class="entry-meta">

<span class="entry-utility-prep entry-utility-prep-cat-links">Posted in</span> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/politics/american-election-2016/" rel="category tag">American Election 2016</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/culture-wars/" rel="category tag">Culture Wars</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/news/europe/" rel="category tag">Europe</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/media/" rel="category tag">Media</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/pcmc/" rel="category tag">PC/MC</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/politics/" rel="category tag">Politics</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/news/usa/" rel="category tag">USA</a> </span>
<span class="sep"> | </span>

</footer><!-- .entry-meta -->
</article><!-- #post-44249 -->

<article id="post-44247" class="post-44247 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-counterjihad category-enrichment category-europe category-immigration category-news category-pcmc category-politics">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/is-austria-moving-to-the-right/" title="Permalink to Is Austria Moving to the Right?" rel="bookmark">Is Austria Moving to the Right?</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/is-austria-moving-to-the-right/" title="9:04 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T21:04:28+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/is-austria-moving-to-the-right/#comments">4</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/austrianresults.gif"></p>
<div align=center><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/austrianresults.gif" border=0 vspace=5 width=540 height=233 title="Austrian election results, October 2017" /></div>
<p></a></p>
<p>The following analysis by <a target="_blank" href="http://english.savefreespeech.org/">Elisabeth Sabaditsch-Wolff</a> of the Austrian general election was published last Tuesday by <a target="_blank" href="http://www.journalistenwatch.com/2017/10/17/rueckt-oesterreich-jetzt-kurz-mal-nach-rechts/">JournalistenWatch</a>. Many thanks to JLH for the translation:</p>
<p><strong>Is Austria Moving (Briefly)<sup>[1]</sup> to the Right?</strong></p>
<p><em>Analysis by Elisabeth Sabaditsch-Wolff.<br />October 17, 2017</em></p>
<p><em>So elections to the National Assembly are — it is tempting to say, finally — finished, and for the assembled worldwide press the name of the future Chancellor is Sebastian Kurz, wunderkind, the Danube Messiah (©Focus), savior of an Austria which had been Islamized and run into the ground by the Grand Coalition. But wait — even Austrian internal politics does not move that fast.</em></p>
<p>Sebastian Kurz, chief of the New (old) Folk Party (ÖVP), achieved a notable victory on Sunday, ahead of the <s>Socialists</s> Social Democrats (SPÖ) and the invigorated Freedom Party (FPÖ). After a weak campaign, internal discussions and a fatal split (resulting in the Pilz List), the Greens exited the National Assembly. The NEOS managed to stay. All other parties were too small to jump the 4% barrier.</p>
<p>The ÖVP waged a nearly flawless — albeit rather bland and insubstantial — campaign. What is remembered is just Kurz hammering on having personally closed the West Balkan route and his promise of a new style in a new government. Criticism of Kurz’s shared responsibility in the chaos proceeding from a unanimity of opinion in the cabinet — especially in the matters of the immigration and asylum crisis, and expanded national debt — bounced off him. Unfortunately, the FPÖ failed to reproach him with the collapse of the Islam Law and the associated, continuing Islamization of Austria. Taking effect in 2015,the Austrian Islam Law became a disaster, as confirmed by Chancellor Kern and Minister of Justice Brandstätter. Kurz, as well as Kern and Brandstätter had been informed of the law’s defects <strong>before</strong> it went into effect.</p>
<p>The SPÖ campaign was shaped by proverbial busts, bad luck and bloopers. The SPÖ’s good result in Vienna can be traced to Mayor Michael Häupl’s propagation of the blue-black bogeyman image, to the great number of immigrants naturalized in recent years, and to the Greens’ inability to recognize the signs of the times. The Vienna result saved the SPÖ from an even greater debacle.</p>
<p>The FPÖ conducted what was a comparatively calm campaign for it, tailored entirely to the personality of H.C. Strache, who was markedly laid-back and statesmanlike. This suited him well, since formation of a government without the FPÖ, i.e., Strache, will not be possible. The FPÖ’s social media campaign with humorous videos can be designated especially successful. Even though Kurz and his ÖVP appropriated many of the FPÖ’s topics, most of the voters were apparently able to distinguish the two parties.</p>
<p>Something to think about is that Austria has probably moved right — much to the displeasure of Juncker and friends — but not nearly as far to the right as believed. In the past two decades, the ÖVP has moved massively to the left; the SPÖ — pressured by the immigration crisis has moved to the right; and now there is a relatively clear majority to the right of center. So this categorization, according to the experts, no longer applies.</p>
<p>So what will happen now in Austria? Will Sebastian Kurz “shortly”[1] become the new head of government — the youngest in the world? It looks like that, but the SPÖ under outgoing Chancellor Kern — focused on preserving its power — could upset those calculations by offering the FPÖ all of the ministries now headed by the ÖVP. Strache will (have to) carefully consider this offer. Tactically, the ÖVP is holding much worse cards. A renewed coalition with the SPÖ seems impossible in light of Kurz’s declaration of a new style in the government. You don’t get together with the party you have accused of a bad style, without expecting an immediate loss of credibility and a 15% fall in the polls. And Strache will not make choosing him as junior partner cheap for the ÖVP.</p>
<p> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/is-austria-moving-to-the-right/#more-44247" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="meta-nav">&rarr;</span></a></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->
<footer class="entry-meta">
<span class="cat-links">
<span class="entry-utility-prep entry-utility-prep-cat-links">Posted in</span> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/counterjihad/" rel="category tag">Counterjihad</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/enrichment/" rel="category tag">Enrichment</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/news/europe/" rel="category tag">Europe</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/immigration/" rel="category tag">Immigration</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/news/" rel="category tag">News</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/pcmc/" rel="category tag">PC/MC</a>, <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/category/politics/" rel="category tag">Politics</a> </span>

<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/new-rules-for-mosques-in-italy/" title="Permalink to New Rules for Mosques in Italy" rel="bookmark">New Rules for Mosques in Italy</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/new-rules-for-mosques-in-italy/" title="7:02 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T19:02:56+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/new-rules-for-mosques-in-italy/#comments">4</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p>Marco Minniti is an Italian politician from the Democratic Party (Social Democrats) and currently the Minister of the Interior. We first met Mr. Minniti a week ago, in a video where he <a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/forget-the-asylum-centers-all-italians-must-take-in-migrants/">expressed his wish</a> that migrants be moved out of big asylum centers and distributed throughout the general population.</p>
<p>In the following video from September 23, the minister sings a different tune as he describes a new law that imposes rules — actual rules! — on mosques and Islamic congregations in Italy.</p>
<p>Many thanks to Elle Bowlly for the translation, and to <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a> for the subtitling:</p>
<p><div align=center><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/G7sy-k7ReHk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>
</p>

<article id="post-44244" class="post-44244 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-enrichment category-europe category-immigration category-media category-news category-pcmc category-politics">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/vittorio-feltri-no-one-in-the-studio-gives-a-damn-about-migrants/" title="Permalink to Vittorio Feltri: No One in the Studio Gives a Damn About Migrants!" rel="bookmark">Vittorio Feltri: No One in the Studio Gives a Damn About Migrants!</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/vittorio-feltri-no-one-in-the-studio-gives-a-damn-about-migrants/" title="6:44 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T18:44:08+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/vittorio-feltri-no-one-in-the-studio-gives-a-damn-about-migrants/#comments">1</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p>Vittorio Feltri is an Italian journalist and editor-in-chief. In the following video from Italian TV, Mr. Feltri — who is now 74 years old, and thus feels free to speak his mind — discusses the ordinary Italian citizens of a town who staged a protest against immigrants. He points out that in contrast, the members of the discussion panel, himself included, have the luxury of not caring because they don’t live anywhere near the immigrants.</p>
<p>Many thanks to Elle Bowlly for the translation, and to <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a> for the subtitling:</p>
<p><div align=center><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ACD6O3aPk8o" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>
</p>

<article id="post-44241" class="post-44241 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-counterjihad category-culture-wars category-europe category-legal-action category-news category-pcmc category-politics category-religion category-usa">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-former-salafista-vs-harvey-ramadan/" title="Permalink to The Former Salafista vs. Harvey Ramadan" rel="bookmark">The Former Salafista vs. Harvey Ramadan</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-former-salafista-vs-harvey-ramadan/" title="12:16 am" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-21T00:16:14+00:00">October 21, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-former-salafista-vs-harvey-ramadan/#comments">10</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/ayari-ramadan.jpg"></p>
<div align=center><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/ayari-ramadan.jpg" border=0 vspace=5 width=470 height=235 title="Henda Ayari and Tariq Ramadan" /></div>
<p></a></p>
<p>The ripples of the Harvey Weinstein affair have spread widely, reaching as far as France and touching the Swiss philosopher Dr. Tariq “Taqiyya” Ramadan. Now that he is being accused of abusing his magisterial office to sexually abuse a young woman (a former Salafist), we’ll have to call him “Tariq Weinstein”, or, better yet, “Harvey Ramadan”.</p>
<p>Many thanks to Ava Lon for the translation, and to <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a> for the subtitling:</p>
<p><div align=center><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sAAlpGP3kNI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>
</p>
<p>Here’s an article on the same topic from <a target="_blank" href="https://english.alarabiya.net/en/News/world/2017/10/21/Islamist-Tariq-Ramadan-accused-of-rape-by-French-activist.html"><em>Al-Arabiya</em></a>:</p>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>Islamist Tariq Ramadan Accused of Rape by Salafist Turned Activist</strong></p>
<p>A rape and sexual assault complaint was filed on Friday in France against Swiss Islamist and Professor Tariq Ramadan by a former Salafist Henda Ayari.</p>
<p>The complaint filed with the Rouen prosecutor’s office in northwestern France, by the Salafist turned secular activist, detailed criminal acts of rape, sexual assault, violence, harassment and intimidation, according to document reviewed by AFP.</p>
<p>The Liberators Association, which Henda Ayari is president of, said on Facebook that she was “a victim of something very serious several years ago” but did not reveal the name of her aggressor for safety reasons.</p>
<p>In her book “I chose to be free”, published in November 2016, she described her aggressor as Zubair.</p>
<p>She said in her writings that she met him at his hotel in Paris after the Islamist thinker gave a lecture.</p>
<p>“I will not give precise details of the acts he has done to me. It is enough to know that he has benefited greatly from my weakness,” Ayari wrote.</p>
<p>She said in her book that when she rebelled against him at one point he screamed at her, insulted her, slapped her and treated her violently.</p>
<p>“I confirm today, that the famous Zubair is Tariq Ramadan,” Ayari published on Facebook.</p>
<p>According to Jonas Haddad, Ayari’s lawyer, the plaintiff did not report the assault earlier, out of fear.</p>
<p>“After revelations over the past few days of rape and sexual assaults claims in the media, Henda has decided to say what happened to her and take legal action,” he told AFP.</p>
<p>Tariq Ramadan could not be reached by AFP and did not react to the allegations on social media.</p>
<p>Ramadan, 55, is the grandson of the founder of the Muslim Brotherhood group in Egypt. He is a professor of contemporary Islamic studies at the University of Oxford in the United Kingdom.</p>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>Video transcript:</strong></p>
<p> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-former-salafista-vs-harvey-ramadan/#more-44241" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="meta-nav">&rarr;</span></a></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->

<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10202017/" title="Permalink to Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/20/2017" rel="bookmark">Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/20/2017</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10202017/" title="11:57 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-20T23:57:47+00:00">October 20, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/gates-of-vienna-news-feed-10202017/#comments">2</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/newsfeed.gif" width=92 height=141 border=0 hspace=8 vspace=5 align=right title="Gates of Vienna News Feed 10/20/2017" />A man went on a rampage in shopping mall in Poland, stabbing seven people at random, killing one of them. Bystanders held the attacker immobile until police arrived. The suspect is a native Pole, and authorities say the incident had nothing to do with terrorism.</p>
<p>In other news, an explosive device was detonated in a parking lot in Colonial Williamsburg just across the street from the College of William and Mary. The initial call to police was for a “car fire”, but police later labeled the device an IED. The investigation is continuing.</p>
<p>To see the headlines and the articles, click “Continue reading” below.</p>
<p>Thanks to <a target="_blank" href="http://www.carolineglick.com/">Caroline Glick</a>, Charles Low, Dean, JD, Reader from Chicago, Red Mike, <a target="_blank" href="http://hinduexistence.org/">Upananda Brahmachari</a>, <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a>, and all the other tipsters who sent these in.</p>
<p><strong>Notice to tipsters:</strong> Please don’t submit extensive excerpts from articles that have been posted behind a subscription firewall, or are otherwise under copyright protection.</p>
<p><strong>Caveat:</strong> Articles in the news feed are posted “as is”. Gates of Vienna cannot vouch for the authenticity or accuracy of the contents of any individual item posted here. We check each entry to make sure it is relatively interesting, not patently offensive, and at least superficially plausible. The link to the original is included with each item’s title. Further research and verification are left to the reader.</p>

<article id="post-44238" class="post-44238 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-civil-liberties category-counterjihad category-culture-wars category-enrichment category-europe category-history category-immigration category-news category-pcmc category-politics">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-minimum-requirements-for-being-labeled-a-nazi-in-modern-multicultural-germany/" title="Permalink to The Minimum Requirements for Being Labeled a “Nazi” in Modern Multicultural Germany" rel="bookmark">The Minimum Requirements for Being Labeled a “Nazi” in Modern Multicultural Germany</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-minimum-requirements-for-being-labeled-a-nazi-in-modern-multicultural-germany/" title="9:28 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-20T21:28:10+00:00">October 20, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/the-minimum-requirements-for-being-labeled-a-nazi-in-modern-multicultural-germany/#comments">10</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><div align=center><img src="http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_md61S_gChL0/SlvgTpJ2JtI/AAAAAAAAAyo/sOu9icDmbpc/s400/nazicarlsberg.jpg" border=0 vspace=5 width=397 height=359 title="Nazi Carlsberg elephant" /></div>
</p>
<p>The brief essay below outlines the requirements for inducing the <a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2011/07/the-screaming-nazi-heeber-jeebers/">Screaming Nazi Heeber-Jeebers</a> in the Gutmenschen of Germany. Which, as far as I can tell, is any political position even slightly to the right of Chancellor Angela Merkel.</p>
<p>Many thanks to JLH for translating this <a target="_blank" href="https://philosophia-perennis.com/2017/10/17/nazi-ecke/">guest-post from David Berger’s blog</a>:</p>
<p><strong>That’s How Easy It is to Be Driven Into the “Nazi Corner”</strong></p>
<p><em>Guest essay by Markus Hibbeler</em></p>
<p>I have listed the attitudes that are sufficient to land you in the “Rightist” corner. You needn’t share all of these things, but they are reasonable and completely legitimate points of view and opinions which many people share, although only a few express them, because they fear being seen as “Nazi,” “hater,” “racist” or something similar. And as far as the moralistic narcissists are concerned, there is no longer any difference between “liberal-conservative,” “rightist,” “right-populist” or even “extreme rightist.”</p>
<p>The following things already lead to the rightist stamp:</p>
<table border=0 cellpadding=0>
<tr>
<td valign=top>1.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being for the deportation of criminal asylum seekers.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>2.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Criticizing Islam with the attitude that it does not belong in Germany.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>3.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being against imported, anti-constitutional, patriarchal philosophies.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>4.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being for a ban of full female covering.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>5.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being against foreign financing of mosques and against import-imams.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>6.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being for each religion living privately, and against clergy taking over public spaces.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>7.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Demanding from new arrivals that they accommodate to and respect our way of life.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>8.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being against a feminine model in which a strand of hair or extra-marital contact with men is considered unseemly.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>9.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being against clans, parallel societies and no-go areas.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>10.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being for women being able to go anywhere freely and safely.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>11.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being of the opinion that all the Erdogan followers among German Turks would be better in Turkey than here with us (and we would gladly accept secular Turks in trade).</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign=top>12.</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
<td valign=top>Being for helping people in true need, but against an uncontrolled mass immigration into the social systems that is unparalleled in any other country.<br />&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p>Many other things could be added:</p>
<p>For example, being against German history being reduced to twelve criminal years; simply being too proud and happy about values like freedom, enlightenment, democracy and sexual equality; being happy that no woman here must be veiled, or virgin in order to be honorable, and gays and apostates are not hanged from the nearest construction crane; just liking European/German culture and finding it, if not without fault, nevertheless both livable and defensible.</p>
<p>Not belonging to any minority, being a heterosexual German male with no “immigration background,” married, with a house and garden, earning his own money and outside of a few tickets having broken no laws, and besides all that, having the gall to like his country and to express all these things straightforwardly — that completes the rightist stamp.</p>
<p>Before anyone becomes concerned, I’m doing fine and I will stick with my opinion. And I recommend to all clandestine, female readers that they do the same. First of all, you are not by any means alone, and second, we are the ones who have it right.</p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->

<article id="post-44236" class="post-44236 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-enrichment category-immigration category-legal-action category-media category-news category-pcmc category-politics category-stupidity category-usa">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/california-set-itself-on-fire/" title="Permalink to California Set Itself on Fire" rel="bookmark">California Set Itself on Fire</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/california-set-itself-on-fire/" title="12:09 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-20T12:09:42+00:00">October 20, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/dymphna/" title="View all posts by Dymphna" rel="author">Dymphna</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/california-set-itself-on-fire/#comments">32</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p><strong>UPDATE:</strong></p>
<p>There is some question in the comments about the accuracy of the Breitbart material used in this post. The problem stems from their lack of link to a quote from ICE about an illegal alien who was purported to have set some of the fires in Sonoma county.</p>
<p>I looked for the blockquoted material Breitbart used, a quote from ICE, but couldn’t find the source to the original link on ICE’s page (ICE.gov is a bureaucratic nightmare to navigate). However, through some backtracking in the Duck Duck Go search engine, the Baron was able to find <a target="_blank" href="https://www.ice.gov/news/releases/statement-ice-acting-director-sonoma-countys-repeated-releases-dangerous-criminal">this on the ICE website</a>. It’s from the acting Director, dated October 18:</p>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>Statement from ICE Acting Director on Sonoma County’s repeated releases of dangerous criminal alien</strong></p>
<p>“Once again, a non-cooperative jurisdiction has left their community vulnerable to dangerous individuals and preventable crimes. ICE lodged a detainer against Jesus Gonzalez with Sonoma County jail officials on October 16, following his arrest on felony charges for maliciously setting fire to a property. This is especially troubling in light of the massive wildfires already devastating the region. Over the past year, ICE has lodged detainers against Mr. Gonzalez after four separate arrests by Sonoma County on various felony and misdemeanor charges. ICE was never notified of Mr. Gonzalez’ various releases. Additionally, Mr. Gonzales has been returned to his home country of Mexico on two separate occasions. The residents of Sonoma County, and the state of California, deserve better than policies that expose them to avoidable dangers. Non-cooperation policies – now enshrined in California state law – ensure only one thing: criminals who would otherwise be deported will be released and left free to reoffend as they please.”</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Evidently the name “Jesus Gonzales” is a common one in California. So there is the additional question as to whether the fellow in the Sonoma County jail is the same person ICE is after.</p>
<p>Meanwhile, the Sonoma County sheriff <a target="_blank" href="http://www.ktvu.com/news/sonoma-sheriff-blasts-ice-for-spreading-misinformation-on-arson-suspect">had this to say</a>:</p>
</p>
<p>On Sunday, the sheriff’s office arrested Gonzalez, 48, for felony arson, which occurred at Maxwell Farms Regional Park in the Sonoma Valley where Gonzales was sleeping, Giordano said. Deputies recognized Gonzalez who told the deputies he lit the fire to keep warm.</p>
<p>Gonzalez is being held in the Sonoma County Jail under $100,000 bail on the arson charge and under $100,000 bail for a misdemeanor drug related warrant from Ventura County, Giordano said.</p>
<p>He was arraigned Wednesday in jail and his next court date has not been set. The Sonoma County Superior Court is closed until Monday because of the fires.</p>
<p>ICE sent a request on Oct. 16 to detain Gonzalez for 48 hours past his scheduled release date from the jail, but the detainer was not signed by a judge and the sheriff’s office could not legally honor it, Giordano said.</p>
<p>ICE spokesman James Schwab said Wednesday ICE filed an administrative detainer to hold Gonzalez, but Giordano said administrative detainers are considered unreasonable search and seizure in violation of the Fourth Amendment.</p>
<p>“ICE has the ability to obtain a warrant for anyone they are interested in like we do everyday in this county. If ICE obtains a warrant I can legally hold the person and would be happy to do so,” Giordano said.</p>
<p>Gonzalez will remain in the Sonoma County Jail until his arson case is adjudicated and Ventura County will then prosecute Gonzalez, Giordano said.</p>
<p>One has to wonder why the Fourth Amendment applies to <a target="_blank" href="http://www.sacbee.com/news/politics-government/capitol-alert/article142502974.html">illegal aliens</a>. But we are talking about California here. They passed that “sanctuary” “law” and Governor Brown <a target="_blank" href="http://www.sfgate.com/news/article/Jerry-Brown-signs-bill-making-California-a-12255884.php">signed the bill</a>:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>SB54, by Senate President Kevin de León, D-Los Angeles, bars law enforcement officers in the state from arresting individuals based on civil immigration warrants, asking about a person’s immigration status or participating in any joint task force with federal officials for the purpose of enforcing immigration laws.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>At any rate, this seems to be a fog-of-war-and-smoke situation. California has declared war on ICE and has passed a “law” that could be construed as a form of secession, or at least the beginning of a pull-out. Sonoma County is following its new state law to the letter.</p>
<p>See you in court.</p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/legalizacion.jpg"></p>
<div align=center><img src="http://gatesofvienna.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/legalizacion.jpg" border=0 vspace=5 width=530 height=185 title="Legalizacion immigrantes" /></div>
<p></a></p>
<p>The suicidal left continues down the low road. Demented Governor Brown and his henchmen in Sacramento concocted a bill making the Golden State the Crazy State.</p>
<p>Here is <a target="_blank" href="https://www.ice.gov/news/releases/statement-ice-acting-director-tom-homan-california-sanctuary-law">ICE’s background commentary</a> about this new sanctuary law [from October 10th]:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Governor Jerry Brown’s decision to sign SB54 and make California a sanctuary state for illegal aliens — including those who have committed crimes — will undermine public safety and hinder ICE from performing its federally mandated mission. The governor is simply wrong when he claims otherwise.</p>
<p>SB54 will negatively impact ICE operations in California by nearly eliminating all cooperation and communication with our law enforcement partners in the state, voiding the delegated authority that the Orange County Sheriff’s Office has under the 287g program, and prohibiting local law enforcement from contracting with the federal government to house detainees.</p>
<p>ICE will have no choice but to conduct at-large arrests in local neighborhoods and at work sites, which will inevitably result in additional collateral arrests, instead of focusing on arrests at jails and prisons where transfers are safer for ICE officers and the community. ICE will also likely have to detain individuals arrested in California in detention facilities outside of the state, far from any family they may have in California.</p>
<p>Ultimately, SB54 helps shield removable aliens from immigration enforcement and creates another magnet for more illegal immigration, all at the expense of the safety and security of the very people it purports to protect.</p>
<p>Despite the severe challenges that this law creates for ICE, we remain committed to our public safety mission and we will continue to do our sworn duty to seek out dangerous criminal aliens and other immigration violators. ICE seeks straightforward cooperation with all sheriffs and local elected officials. This misguided legislation will severely undermine those efforts.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Now <a target="_blank" href="http://www.sacbee.com/news/state/california/fires/article179572631.html">ICE has confirmed</a> that an illegal alien, arrested five times in the past year, deported twice, is responsible for the some of the fires set in Sonoma County — more than one billion dollars’ worth of destruction, not to mention the dozens of deaths.</p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://www.breitbart.com/california/2017/10/19/wine-country-ice-director-illegal-alien-charged-with-felony-sonoma-fire-twice-returned-to-mexico-sanctuary-state/">Breitbart</a> seems to have the only direct quote from Acting Director Homan on this:</p>
<p> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/california-set-itself-on-fire/#more-44236" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="meta-nav">&rarr;</span></a></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->

<p>In other news, the public prosecutor in the German city of Bonn is asking for a sentence of 13 years in prison for the Ghanaian immigrant who raped a young woman at knifepoint at a campsite last summer.</p>

<article id="post-44234" class="post-44234 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-canada category-civil-liberties category-counterjihad category-culture-wars category-enrichment category-legal-action category-media category-pcmc category-politics category-religion category-sharia">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/quebec-tackles-the-burka-issue/" title="Permalink to Quebec Tackles the Burka Issue" rel="bookmark">Quebec Tackles the Burka Issue</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/quebec-tackles-the-burka-issue/" title="11:44 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-19T23:44:20+00:00">October 19, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/quebec-tackles-the-burka-issue/#comments">6</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p>To call the following CTV news report “tendentious” would hardly do it justice. It discusses the recent passage of a law against full-face coverings in Quebec, and the anchor naturally focuses on the injustices that it would impose on those poor, poor Muslim women — who will be “forced” to remain at home.</p>
<p>I doubt that the writers who composed the copy for this report realized the implications of their assertions. If Muslim women are <em>forced</em> to remain at home due to the burka ban, it means that the wearing of the garment is not voluntary, as the Progressives like to maintain. It is <em>mandatory</em>, not optional, implying that somebody, somewhere — presumably a husband, father, or brother — makes these women cover their faces in public.</p>
<p>Otherwise they would risk… What? What does CTV think the penalty would be for a failure to cover up? And who would administer it?</p>
<p>Many thanks to <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a> for annotating and uploading this video:</p>
<p><div align=center><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/T6X6HFZtGcc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->

<article id="post-44233" class="post-44233 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-culture-wars category-news category-politics">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/john-kelly-sets-the-record-straight/" title="Permalink to John Kelly Sets the Record Straight" rel="bookmark">John Kelly Sets the Record Straight</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/john-kelly-sets-the-record-straight/" title="8:12 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-19T20:12:30+00:00">October 19, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/dymphna/" title="View all posts by Dymphna" rel="author">Dymphna</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/john-kelly-sets-the-record-straight/#comments">9</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p>There is yet another fake news cycle about President Trump. This time it concerns what he said to the wife, now widow, of one of the four soldiers who died in Niger. The MSM simply never gives up in their ongoing smear attack against Trump.</p>
<p>Former General John Kelly, a Gold-Star father himself, with another son deployed in Iraq right now, held an impromptu press conference to criticize the Congresswoman who tried to make political hay out of this soldier&#8217;s death. </p>
<p>Kelly is eloquent: </p>
<p><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ps5ttDzWBaY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->

<article id="post-44232" class="post-44232 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-arab-spring category-counterjihad category-domestic-terrorism category-enrichment category-europe category-holy-war category-middle-east category-news category-pcmc category-politics category-stupidity">
<header class="entry-header">
<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/mutti-take-me-home-from-camp-shahada/" title="Permalink to Mutti, Take Me Home From Camp Shahada!" rel="bookmark">Mutti, Take Me Home From Camp Shahada!</a></h1>
<div class="entry-meta">
<span class="sep">Posted on </span><a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/mutti-take-me-home-from-camp-shahada/" title="7:01 pm" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2017-10-19T19:01:52+00:00">October 19, 2017</time></a><span class="by-author"> <span class="sep"> by </span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="http://gatesofvienna.net/author/baron/" title="View all posts by Baron Bodissey" rel="author">Baron Bodissey</a></span></span> </div><!-- .entry-meta -->
<div class="comments-link">
<a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/mutti-take-me-home-from-camp-shahada/#comments">34</a> </div>
</header><!-- .entry-header -->

<div class="entry-content">
<p>The following video shows an appeal made by a young German woman who converted to Islam and made hijra to Syria to fight for the Islamic State (or at least get married to an ISIS fighter). As the Islamic State collapsed, she was captured by the Peshmerga and interned in a POW camp. Now she wants to come home, and appeals directly to Angela Merkel for help.</p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="https://blazingnash.com/">Nash Montana</a>, who translated the video for subtitles, has these observations about the patois spoken by the young German Muslima:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Even though Nadja R. is a German-born German, she speaks the language like a retarded person. You might say she speaks “ebonics”, German-style. The kind of Islamized German that Muslims speak in Germany. She has totally taken on the low-IQ-speak and -think of Muslims.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>Many thanks to <a target="_blank" href="http://vladtepesblog.com/">Vlad Tepes</a> for the subtitling:</p>
<p><div align=center><iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/beuyidScYP4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>
</p>
<p><strong>Video transcript:</strong></p>
<p> <a href="http://gatesofvienna.net/2017/10/mutti-take-me-home-from-camp-shahada/#more-44232" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="meta-nav">&rarr;</span></a></p>
</div><!-- .entry-content -->
